cast.overview: One man's campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.
cast.title: The Beekeeper

details.biography: Sunny Dhillon is a multiple award winning actor, writer and director from Cardiff, Wales. He first graduated from Cardiff University with a Business Management degree and then pursued his dream of acting. He recently had a major supporting role on the Ron Howard production 68 Whiskey on Paramount Network TV. He has also written, directed and produced short films which have won awards around the globe.
details.name: Sunny Dhillon
